ValidationRule.description: When Job Outcome involves referring externally then a Referred To value must be included.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Ref to Other Jurisdiction – Welfare Issue"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Referred to External Wildlife Carer/ Rescuer"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Referred to RSPCA Wildlife Responder"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Ref to Other Jurisdiction – No Welfare Issue") ), ISBLANK(animalos__Referred_To__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Job Outcome involves referring externally then a Referred To value must be included.
